page.title: 16SKI ROSSENDALE
page.content: Ski Rossendale is by the northen end of the M66 motorway,on the outskirts of Rawtenstall,and commands a superb veiw over Rossendale valley.Its biggest slope is 180m by 12m, intermediate slope is 60m by 12m and learners slope is 30m by 12m. Each slope is served by a ski tow.A licensed cafateria,the Ellis Brigham ski shop,a lecture room and a hotel adjacent to the centre.Ski Rossendale is ideal for all grades of skiers and for both individuals and groups.Skiing is therefore an all year {sport.}The Ski Rossendale have a ski club which meets every Monday evening.The{leisure and {recreation}atracks {tourists}from all over England.Open ours Tuesday to Friday:-10:00am to 9:15pm Saturday and Sunday(9am-5pm)Monday closed except on bank holidays.You can hire skis,boots and poles.
